text: btw what term is currently recommended - gks, qt, js?

elements.text: btw what term is currently recommended - gks, qt, js?

text: GKS QtTerm is supported for all platforms (and probably the fastest backend) - on macOS users might use GKSTerm as a native Quartz implementation. The JS backend is provided for browser (or Pluto) environments.
